pr_title: Implement ARRAYLENGTH UDF for multi-valued columns

timeline.message: Implement LENGTH UDF for multi-valued columns
Add integration test for LENGTH UDF

timeline.bodyText: Add java docs with a  sample query.
timeline.author: kishoreg

timeline.bodyText:
Since this applies to multi-valued column, It might be better to name this array_length or cardinality.
https://prestodb.io/docs/current/functions/array.html

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the suggestion. Changed this to arrayLength so people do not confuse it with the length function for strings.
replies.author: bozhang2820
